definition: unrepentant and incapable of being reformed
details:
adjective
- unrepentant and incapable of being reformed
= example: unrepentant and incapable of being reformed
= synonyms: unreformable
- not reformed morally or spiritually
= example: not reformed morally or spiritually
= synonyms: unregenerated
- tenaciously unwilling or marked by tenacious unwillingness to yield
= synonyms: obstinate, stubborn
